channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pope’s naming of New York archbishop signals continued challenge to Trump on immigration
item.description: Pope Leo XIV named Ronald Hicks, who endorsed message condemning immigration raids, to lead one of the biggest US archdioceses Pope Leo XIV has named ...

item.title: Badenoch says teaching boys about misogyny shouldn’t be a priority because migrants more dangerous to women and girls – UK politics live
item.description: Tory leader dismisses the government’s newly published strategy as a ‘complete distraction’ Richard Adams is the Guardian’s education editor. The Brit...

item.title: Thousands to avoid Christmas on streets as Home Office ordered to delay refugee evictions
item.description: Move-on period extended from 28 days to 56 days if person recently granted refugee status is at risk of sleeping rough The UK high court has halted ev...

item.title: White House says US would be ‘lucky’ if Trump stayed for third term
item.description: Comments follow reports the US president discussed the idea with Alan Dershowitz, a constitutional scholar who defended him US politics live – latest ...

item.title: PPE company linked to ex-Tory peer Michelle Mone goes into liquidation
item.description: PPE Medpro owes government £148m for supplying unusable personal protective equipment during Covid-19 pandemic The company linked to the former Conser...

item.title: Worst start in Old Firm history - how does Celtic manager Nancy compare?
item.description: Wilfried Nancy is the first Old Firm boss to lose his opening four matches - can he recover Celtic's season and survive?

item.title: Trump Media to merge with nuclear fusion firm in $6bn deal
item.description: The company behind President Trump's Truth Social platform makes a surprising move into the energy sector.

item.title: Waterloo Road actor William Rush dies aged 31
item.description: Rush also starred in Grange Hill and Vera, and was the son of Coronation Street star Debbie Rush.

item.title: Zelensky gives stark warning as EU leaders hold crunch talks on Russia's frozen assets
item.description: The EU is deciding whether to loan tens of billions of euros of Russian money to fund Ukraine's military and economic needs.

item.title: King Charles pours 'perfect pint' at new brewery
item.description: King Charles visited a new Guinness brewery in London on his first visit since sharing "good news" about his cancer treatment.
